message: Hello Bob, thank you for considering our product! We're excited to discuss the possibility of working together. After careful consideration, we're willing to offer you the product at a price of $1300000. We believe this is a fair price considering the value it will bring to your business.

Thank you for the offer, Alice. I'm interested in the product, but I was thinking more along the lines of $1200000. I believe this is a fair price considering the market value and the price you mentioned earlier.

Thank you for your counteroffer, Bob. We appreciate your interest in the product. After re-evaluating the market value, we're willing to meet you halfway. We're offering the product to you for $1250000. We believe this is a fair price considering the product's value and your counteroffer.

Thank you for the new offer, Alice. I appreciate your willingness to meet me halfway. However, I'm still a bit above my target budget. I'm willing to go up to $1220000, but I think that's as high as I can go. I hope we can find a mutually beneficial price.

Thank you for your revised offer, Bob. We appreciate your willingness to negotiate. However, we're still a bit apart. We're willing to make another concession and offer the product to you for $1235000. We believe this is a fair price considering the product's value and your budget.

Thank you for the new offer, Alice. I appreciate your willingness to make another concession. However, I'm still a bit above my target budget. I'm willing to go up to $1200000, but I think that's as high as I can go. I hope we can find a mutually beneficial price.
